metadata.title: CVE-2024-45796 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine. Prior to version 7.0.7, alogic error during fragment reassembly can lead to failed reassembly forvalid traffic. An attacker could craft packets to trigger thisbehavior.This issue has been addressed in 7.0.7.

criterions.comment: suricata package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
